data.eml:eml: Return Verdesmum menglaense to the genus Hylodesmum (Fabaceae) based on morphological and molecular evidence

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Song, Zhu-Qiu, Yao, Gang, Pan, Bo, Li, Jian-Wu, Huang, Xiang-Xu, Tan, Yun-Hong, Xu, Dong-Xian (2019): Return Verdesmum menglaense to the genus Hylodesmum (Fabaceae) based on morphological and molecular evidence. PhytoKeys 126: 1-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.126.34599, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.126.34599
